sentence.Network_en: Many drugs were found by trial and error.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多药物都是通过反复试验才发现的。

sentence.Network_en: She feels that raising her children has been a matter of trial and error.
sentence.Network_cn: 她感到抚养孩子就像是摸着石头过河。

sentence.Network_en: They didn't know how to put in a central heating system, but they managed it by trial and error.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不知道怎样安装集中供暖设备, 但是经过反复试验终于安装好了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 试误法 (Trial-And-Error) 一次一因子法 (One-Factor-At-a-Time) 全因子法 (Full-factorial experiments) 部分因子试验法田口式直.
through trial-and-error , you will know exactly how much to give them at feeding time .透过反复试验法，你将知道在喂食时间究竟该给多少饲料。

list.abs: 藉由尝试错误（trial and error）的过程，累积成功与失败的经验，人们就会渐渐了解生命程式的规则与语法，进而掌握撰写生命蓝图 …

means.word_mean: 1. trying out various means or theories until error is satisfactorily reduced or eliminated;

sentences.sentence: "he argued that all learning is a trial-and-error process that resembles biological evolution"

means.word_mean: 2. relating to solving problems by experience rather than theory;
